faqs.question: Where can I stay?
faqs.answer:
Looking for a place to kick back and relax after a full day of networking? There are loads of great hotels within walking distance.
We have secured a discounted rate at the BobW properties - please use the code

You can also access your badge via the app

faqs.question: How do I get to Paris?
faqs.answer:
Paris is accessible by plane, train, bike and foot – you could even get there by horse if you have one handy. Point is, it's seriously central, just over a 10-minute walk from Paris Centraal Station. Check out the venue section of the website for the map and details.
